Package de.aicard.account

Class Account

java.lang.Object
de.aicard.account.Account
Direct Known Subclasses:
Professor, Student
public abstract class Account
extends java.lang.Object
is the stencil for the subclasses Professor and Student contains basic attributes of and account, who get more specific in the subclasses Provides the user with the functionalities to personalize their account
Author:
Antonio Blechschmidt

    void addNewFavoriteLearnSet​(LearnSet _favoriteSet)  
    void clicksLikeOfMessage​(int _chatIndex, int _messageIndex)
    the function clicksLikeOfMessage is used on a specific message to like or dislike it clickLike checks if a person is in the list of those who liked the message if this account liked the message, his name is removed from the list (dislike) if this account didn't like the message,his name is added to the list (like)
